name: BIL - Binary Inspection Language
short_description:
Binary Inspection Language (BIL) is a language to write assertions on a file.
Like the regular expressions, the engine go to check if file is conform with assertion. 

The files wrote in BIL can be compiled as an executable, or passed to the engine when we check the file.  

BIL is useful to create from the specification of a file format, a program for validate a file in this format.
summary: BIL is a language to write assertions on a file
